Summary: Sprint 4 – Standards Profile Stack & Audit-Ready Compliance
Description: Introduce multi-industry standards layering and auditor-grade reporting on top of governed plans.
Implement a layered standards/compliance profile system to support aerospace medical automotive and customer-specific deltas.
Define Base Profile Domain Profile and Customer Override Profile structure.
Create schema for standards profiles including source standard and clause references.
Implement deterministic inheritance and override resolution between profile layers.
Ensure conflicting or circular profile rules are rejected.
Allow SOE runs to select active standards profiles and track their influence on plan generation.
Add profile selection to SOERun inputs.
Tag SOE decisions with originating profile and clause.
Verify plan steps reference correct standards source.
Expose why each plan step test or evidence exists and which standard requires it.
Create mapping between standards clauses and plan steps.
Expose API to retrieve compliance justification per step.
Ensure traceability survives edits optimizations and overrides.
Generate auditor-facing reports showing compliance coverage and deviations.
Define report format suitable for AS9100 NASA ISO audits.
Generate report from approved plan and profile stack.
Include explicit listing of overrides approvals and justifications.
Expose standards profile stack and compliance traceability in Ops UI.
Display active standards profiles and inheritance order.
Allow users to click a step and see required clauses.
Visually warn when overrides affect compliance.
Formalize exports into controlled traveler-style execution artifacts.
Add revision numbers and approval signatures to exports.
Support digital sign-off fields for production and QA.
Restrict traveler distribution to approved audiences.
Expand red-team tests to cover standards layering and compliance bypass attempts.
Ensure profiles cannot be silently removed or downgraded.
Block repeated or cascading overrides without escalation.
Update PRD and developer documentation to lock standards layering model.
Document profile stack architecture and guarantees.
Add guidance for adding new standards profiles.
